P

Page - Enum Class in constants
Defines the pages available in the application.
pageAction - Variable in class pages.AuthScreen
PageAction instance for handling screen transitions and actions.
pageAction - Variable in class pages.components.PinForm
Action handler for form events.
PageAction - Class in pages.functions
Manages the navigation and visibility of different screens within the application.
PageAction() - Constructor for class pages.functions.PageAction
Constructs a PageAction, initializing all screen instances and adding them to the screen list.
pages - package pages
Consists of classes that define the different screens of the GUI.
pages.components - package pages.components
Contains components that are used within the screens of the POS system, such as custom buttons, text fields, etc.
pages.functions - package pages.functions
Handles the functionality for page navigation and page actions.
pageType - Variable in class pages.AuthScreen
The type of the page which determines the context of the authentication process.
panel - Variable in class pages.components.PinForm
Panel containing the buttons.
PIN_LENGTH - Variable in class pages.components.PinForm
The required length of the PIN to be entered.
PIN_LENGTH - Variable in class pages.InventoryScreen
Constant defining the dimensions and positioning of UI elements.
PIN_LENGTH - Variable in class pages.RegisterScreen
The required length of the manager PIN to be entered, if applicable.
pinField - Variable in class pages.AuthScreen
The text field for PIN input.
PinForm - Class in pages.components
Represents a PIN input form with functionality to clear and submit the PIN.
PinForm(PageAction) - Constructor for class pages.components.PinForm
Constructs a PinForm with a specified PageAction for event handling.
plus - Variable in class pages.InventoryScreen
Icon used for action buttons on the screen.
PRIMARY_BACKGROUND - Static variable in class constants.Style
The primary background color used throughout the application.
